description: It might be useful for debugging, analysis, or complete removal to make the timing that guestfs is doing for waiting for its processes to end to be configurable (possibly having the < 0 case remove the functionality completely?). Although this might not be 100% needed in the long term (guestfs/fuse should be fixed anyway) it might be useful in the short term (?)
title: Guestfs make 10s configurable

comments.content: This seems like something better discussed on the openstack-dev list.  I'm not a fan of new options if we can avoid them, especially for trivial tweaks of behavior.  It seems like we should be able to have it set to a reasonable default.  If you have seen problems with it being 10 seconds, perhaps we can just increase it.
